categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Dust Squadron was a Rebel Alliance starfighter unit led by Rik Torrence and stationed at the Arda I Rebel base. It was in operation by the time of the Battle of the Gauntlet in 0 ABY, but was reserved for key missions in the sector. The squadron fought in the Battle of the Gauntlet.
Dust Squadron appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game adventure Onslaught at Arda I.
